thirdparty-drtrigonbot-subster-summary-m:
Summary line (second part) if the page had to be modified due to new results. Parameters:
* %(tags)s is a list of tag(s) updated on page
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-notify-c: First part of message if discussion has changed.
First part of message if discussion was closed.
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-notify-m:
First part of message if it is a extraordinary maintenance message.

(It's a system message that can only be triggered by the bot maintainer. Thus it's not important to translate the text.)
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-notify-n: First part of message if discussion is new.

First part of message if it is a interwiki notification.
{{Identical|Notification}}
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-parse: Message for reporting of new or changed discussion pages (sections within pages).
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-parse-cl: Message for reporting of closed discussion pages.
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-parse-en: Message footer for bot report output. Parameters: * %(sign)s - signature and date (4 tildes, ~~~~) "From" probably refers to the name of the bot and "at" probably refers to the timestamp.
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-parse-no: Message part indicating the fact that no human editor is given for a page.
Message for reporting of interwiki notifications.
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-parse-st:
Message header for bot report output. Is just a timestamp format and language independent.

Timestamp format markers are as in the "strftime" C function. See "man 3 strftime" on any Linux/Unix system, or [[w:strftime|strftime]]
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-parse-wa: Message for reporting of unexpected behaviour or situations to the user.
thirdparty-drtrigonbot-sum_disc-summary-: Summary line second part if there are additional results.
Summary line second part if there are additional results and old get removed.

Summary line second part if the page had to be modified due to new results.

Parameters:
* %(num)i - the number of entries
* %(page)s - the page that was updated
